channel.title: CVE Feed for resque -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for resque -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-50724|2024-08-27T15:02:43.928Z -- resque -- resque
item.description: Resque (pronounced like "rescue") is a Redis-backed library for creating background jobs, placing those jobs on multiple queues, and processing them later. resque-web in resque versions before 2.1.0 are vulnerable to reflected XSS through the current_queue parameter in the path of the queues endpoint. This issue has been patched in version 2.1.0.
